dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement - Prestonburgcc.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Desai, Hiren (Finance OGC) [mailto:Hiren.Desai@ky.gov] 
Sent: Friday, February 10, 2006 8:40 AM
To: 'Copyright@theplanet.com'
Cc: Kays, Bradley (COT); Whitehouse, Toby (COT); Watkins, Brad (COT)
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement - Prestonburgcc.com



ATTN:

 

George Poletes

General Counsel

ThePlanet.com

 

Please see the attached letter and notice of copyright infringement of
materials belonging to the Commonwealth of Kentucky.  

 

The Commonwealth of Kentucky requests that The Planet expeditiously remove
the copyrighted material on the infringing website and disable access to
this material permanently.

 

Sincerely,

 

Hiren B. Desai 

Legal Services for Finance and Technology

Finance and Administration Cabinet

702 Capitol Annex, Room 188

Frankfort, KY  40601

Phone: 502-564-6660

Email:  Hiren.Desai@ky.gov

 

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is
for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential
and privileged information.  Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or
distribution is prohibited.  If you are not the intended recipient, please
contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original
message.
dmca.principal_name: Legal Services for Finance and Technology, Finance and Administration Cabinet
